ValidationRule.description: Opportunities should not be created with Record type Hunting, prospecting, Inboud.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISNEW(), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Prospecting', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Hunting' , RecordType.DeveloperName ='Inbound' )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please create opportunity with record type "Sales".
